nodes.text: Polarin the War Marshal was a male Geonosian residing in the Manister Base on Tatooine around 3643 BBY, when he was killed by a Republic individual.

Polarin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Tatooine. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
